HDG.BT.content: in investigations where thing is deeply veiled, don’t overestimate results: constantly face possibility of disclosing an even more primordial/universal horizon from which to draw answer to question: “What is Being?” [Seinsfrage] > must reawaken question of Being before achieving positive results, arrive at a field where we can come to terms w/ it in a way that can be controlled [totally other—then teleological control?]

HDG.LP.content: beneath the one semblance is concealed the Einfalt of pain, flaming the furthest when holds to itself most intimately [beholding vision] > pain as Grundzug of great soul, in pure harmony w/ holiness of blue: “blue shines upon the soul’s face by withdrawing into its own depth” > holy is present (west)/endures (währt) only by keeping w/in this withdrawal (in diesem Entzug verhält), turning vision toward fitting (Fügsame) [via flame of pain]

HDG.OHF.content: [why phenomenology requires destruction] in any discipline, we’re face to face w/ how things stand at the moment [i.e. how the public world views them] > their showing-themselves (Sich-zeigen) can be so restricted/fixed (festgelegt) by tradition, the inauthenticity goes unnoticed, taken for authentic: one passes off a contingency (Zufälligkeit) as an in-itself, takes a covering up (Verdeckung) for Sache itself > need to get beyond position started from (Anfangsstellung) & arrive at grasp of subject matter free of covering up (zur verdeckungsfreien Sacherfassung zu kommen) > the tradition must be dismantled (abgebaut)
